articles.title: The Debt-Inflation Channel of the German (Hyper) Inflation
articles.authors: Markus Brunnermeier, Sergio Correia, Stephan Luck, Emil Verner, Tom Zimmermann
articles.abstract: This paper studies how a large increase in the price level is transmitted to the real economy through firm balance sheets. Using newly digitized macro- and micro-level data from the German inflation of 1919–1923, we show that inflation led to a large reduction in real debt burdens and bankruptcies. Firms with higher nominal liabilities at the onset of inflation experienced a larger decline in interest expenses, a relative increase in their equity values, and higher employment during the inflation. The results are consistent with real effects of a debt-inflation channel that operates even when prices and wages are flexible.
articles.title_cn: 德国（超）通货膨胀的债务-通胀渠道
articles.abstract_cn: 本文研究了价格水平大幅上升是如何通过公司资产负债表传导至实体经济的。利用1919-1923年德国通货膨胀期间新近数字化的宏观和微观层面数据，我们展示了通货膨胀导致实际债务负担和破产数量大幅减少。在通货膨胀开始时拥有更高名义负债的公司，在通货膨胀期间经历了利息支出的更大下降，其股本价值相对增加，以及就业人数更高。这些结果与债务-通货膨胀渠道的实际效应一致，即使在价格和工资具有灵活性的情况下，这种渠道也能发挥作用。

articles.title: The End of Privilege: A Reexamination of the Net Foreign Asset Position of the United States
articles.authors: Andrew Atkeson, Jonathan Heathcote, Fabrizio Perri
articles.abstract: The US net foreign asset position declined sharply after 2007, reaching negative 60 percent of GDP by the third quarter of 2023. This deterioration primarily reflects a US-specific rise in corporate asset values that inflated the value of US equity liabilities to the rest of the world. To interpret these trends, we develop an international macro-finance model of flows, stocks, asset valuations, the current account,and the net foreign asset position. We find that the welfare impact of rising asset values for a representative US household has been quite negative given extensive foreign ownership of US corporate equity.
articles.title_cn: 《特权的终结：对美国净外国资产状况的再审视》
articles.abstract_cn: 2007年之后，美国的净外国资产头寸急剧下降，到2023年第三季度达到了GDP的负60%。这种恶化主要反映了美国特有的公司资产价值上升，这使得美国对世界其他地区的股权负债价值膨胀。为了解释这些趋势，我们开发了一个国际宏观金融模型，该模型涉及流动、存量、资产估值、经常账户和净外国资产头寸。我们发现，对于一个代表性的美国家庭来说，由于外国对美国公司股权的广泛持有，资产价值上升的福利影响是非常负面的。

articles.title: Innovative Ideas and Gender (In)equality
articles.abstract: This paper analyzes recognition of women's innovative ideas compared to men's using bibliometric data in economics, mathematics, and sociology. I establish similarities between papers to construct relevant counterfactual citations. On average, all-female papers receive 10 percent fewer citations than all-male papers, a disparity reduced by 40 percent when considering team sizes and disappearing in most fields with authors' publication records. Additionally, strong in-group preferences emerge: All-male teams omit more papers with women, and vice versa. Accounting for publication histories, female scholars are cited 0 percent (economics) to 11 percent (mathematics) less, with early-career women enduring a 9–14 percent citation penalty.
articles.title_cn: 创新思想与性别（不）平等
articles.abstract_cn: 本文利用经济学、数学和社会学专业的文献计量数据，分析了对女性创新思想的认可度与男性相比如何。我建立了论文之间的相似性，构建了相关的反事实引用。平均而言，全女性论文的引用次数比全男性论文少10%，当考虑团队规模时，这一差距减少了40%，在大多数领域中随着作者的发表记录而消失。此外，出现了强烈的内群体偏好：全男性团队更多地忽略了有女性的论文，反之亦然。考虑到发表历史，女性学者的引用次数在经济学中减少了0%（经济学）到数学中的11%，职业早期的女性承受了9-14%的引用惩罚。

articles.title: A Stepping Stone Approach to Norm Transitions
articles.authors: Selim Gulesci, Sam Jindani, Eliana La Ferrara, David Smerdon, Munshi Sulaiman, Peyton Young
articles.abstract: We propose a model to study when an intermediate action can serve as a stepping stone that enables the elimination of a harmful norm. While the intermediate action may facilitate the first "step," it may also become a new norm. We derive intuitive conditions for stepping stones, which depend on the relative size of social penalties and intrinsic utility benefits. We propose an econometric approach to testing whether an intermediate action is a stepping stone, and apply it to original data on female genital cutting in Somalia. The analysis shows that the intermediate action may become the new norm.
articles.abstract_cn: 我们提出了一个模型来研究一个中间行为何时可以作为一个垫脚石，帮助消除一个有害的规范。虽然这个中间行为可能促进了第一步的“迈出”，但它也可能成为一个新规范。我们推导出了垫脚石的直观条件，这些条件取决于社会惩罚的相对大小和内在效用的好处。我们提出了一种计量经济学方法来测试一个中间行为是否是一个垫脚石，并将这种方法应用于索马里女性割礼的原始数据。分析表明，中间行为可能成为新规范。

articles.title: Home Price Expectations and Spending: Evidence from a Field Experiment
articles.authors: Felix Chopra, Christopher Roth, Johannes Wohlfart
articles.abstract: We conduct a field experiment with US households to study how expectations about long-run home price growth shape spending decisions. We exogenously vary survey respondents' expectations by providing different expert forecasts. Homeowners' spending, measured using rich home-scanner data, is inelastic to home price expectations. By contrast, renters reduce their spending when expecting higher home price growth. These patterns reflect positive wealth effects for owners from higher future wealth and negative income effects for both groups due to higher future housing costs. Our study highlights consequences of asset price growth and long-term expectations about the economy for household behavior.
articles.title_cn: 房价预期与消费：来自现场实验的证据
articles.abstract_cn: 我们与美国家庭一起进行了一项实地实验，以研究对长期房价增长的预期如何塑造消费决策。我们通过提供不同的专家预测来外生地改变调查受访者的预期。使用丰富的家庭扫描数据测量的房主消费对房价预期不敏感。相比之下，租房者在预期房价增长较高时会减少消费。这些模式反映了房主因未来财富增加而产生的积极财富效应，以及两组人因未来住房成本增加而产生的消极收入效应。我们的研究强调了资产价格增长和对经济的长期预期对家庭行为的影响。

articles.title: Mission Motivation and Public Sector Performance: Experimental Evidence from Pakistan
articles.abstract: This paper studies, through a randomized field experiment involving community health workers in Pakistan, if public sector organizations can improve worker performance by investing in their mission motivation. The findings reveal that training aimed at strengthening mission motivation improves workers' performance in their core responsibility of monthly household visits, as well as in multiple tasks performed during and outside these visits. This holistic improvement in performance leads to improved health outcomes for children in the communities served by these workers. These results highlight the importance of promoting organizational missions as a strategy to improve public sector performance in low-income countries.
articles.title_cn: 任务动机与公共部门绩效：来自巴基斯坦的实验证据
articles.abstract_cn: 本文通过在巴基斯坦开展的一项涉及社区卫生工作者的随机现场实验，研究了公共部门组织是否可以通过投资于员工的使命感来提高员工的工作表现。研究结果表明，旨在加强使命感的培训能够提高员工在履行每月家庭访问这一核心职责方面的表现，以及在这些访问期间和之外执行的多项任务的表现。这种全面的表现提升，导致这些工作者服务的社区儿童的健康结果得到改善。这些结果强调了将推广组织使命作为一种策略，以提高低收入国家公共部门的表现的重要性。

articles.title: The Long-Run Effects of Government Spending
articles.abstract: Military spending has large and persistent effects on output because it shifts the composition of public spending toward R&D. This boosts innovation and private investment in the medium term and increases productivity and GDP at longer horizons. Public R&D expenditure stimulates economic activities beyond the business cycle even when it is not associated with war spending. In contrast, the effects of public investment are shorter-lived, while public consumption has a modest impact at most horizons. We reach these conclusions using BVAR with long lags and 125 years of US data, including newly reconstructed series of government spending by main categories since 1890.
articles.abstract_cn: 军事支出对产出具有巨大而持久的影响，因为它将公共支出的构成转向研发。这在中期内促进了创新和私人投资，并在更长远的范围内提高了生产率和国内生产总值。即使公共研发支出与战争支出无关，它也能刺激经济活动超越商业周期。相比之下，公共投资的影响较为短暂，而公共消费在大多数时间范围内的影响最多是温和的。我们通过使用具有长滞后的BVAR模型和125年的美国数据得出这些结论，其中包括自1890年以来政府按主要类别支出的新重建系列。

articles.title: Undergraduate Gender Diversity and the Direction of Scientific Research
articles.abstract: Can diversity lead to greater research focus on populations under-represented in science? Between 1960 and 1990, 76 all-male US universities transitioned to coeducation. Using a generalized difference-in-differences design, we find that coeducation led to a 44 percent increase in gender-related research publications. This increase is driven by research focused on female subjects and gender differences. While coeducation led to a compositional shift with more women and researchers interested in gender topics, much of the increase comes from male incumbent researchers shifting their research focus toward gender-related topics. The results support interaction with more diverse students and peers as key underlying mechanisms.
articles.title_cn: 本科性别多样性与科学研究的方向
articles.abstract_cn: 多样性是否能够导致对科学中代表性不足的人群的研究关注度增加？在1960年到1990年间，76所全男性的美国大学转变为男女同校。使用广义的双重差分设计，我们发现男女同校导致与性别相关的研究出版物增加了44%。这一增加是由关注女性主题和性别差异的研究推动的。虽然男女同校导致了更多女性和对性别话题感兴趣的研究人员的构成变化，但增加的很大一部分来自于现任男性研究人员将他们的研究重点转向与性别相关的主题。结果支持与更多样化的学生和同行互动作为关键的潜在机制。

articles.title: Effects of Enhanced Legal Aid in Child Welfare: Evidence from a Randomized Trial of Mi Abogado
articles.authors: Ryan Cooper, Joseph J. Doyle, Andrés Hojman
articles.abstract: Children spend years in foster care, and bureaucratic hurdles can unnecessarily prolong their stays. The Mi Abogado program was introduced in Chile to enhance legal aid for foster children and accelerate family reunification. In a novel approach, the Chilean government randomized the introduction of the program for children living in institutions to evaluate effects on child well-being. Using registry data, we find the program significantly reduced the duration of foster care without increasing subsequent maltreatment and placements. The exposure also decreased criminal justice involvement and improved school attendance. Results suggest that strengthening foster care services can cost-effectively improve child well-being.
articles.title_cn: 加强儿童福利法律援助的效果：来自“我的律师”随机试验的证据
articles.abstract_cn: 儿童在寄养家庭中度过多年，而官僚障碍可能会不必要地延长他们的停留时间。为了加强寄养儿童的法律援助并加速家庭团聚，智利引入了“我的律师”计划。智利政府采用了一种新颖的方法，对居住在机构中的儿童随机引入该计划，以评估其对儿童福祉的影响。利用登记数据，我们发现该计划显著缩短了寄养时间，而没有增加随后的虐待和安置。接触该计划还减少了刑事司法的介入，并提高了学校出勤率。结果表明，加强寄养服务可以以成本效益的方式改善儿童福祉。
